text:
In the documentation for fileset at http://ant.apache.org/manual/Types/fileset.html there is a small error.

In the table of attributes, the "include" attribute is listed as "includes" and the "exclude" attribute is listed as "excludes".

The letter 's' should be removed in the attribute table.
creator: irv@us.ibm.com
bodewig@apache.org
text: I can't see anything wrong there.  The attribute is named includes and accepts a list of patterns, the nested element is called include and accepts a single pattern.
